name: DGCP | MaMeeFarm™ — Proof 406 | Weeding and Soil Loosening for Kale Plants
description:
This NFT documents a real-world agricultural activity at MaMeeFarm™ on
29 December 2025 at 08:02 (Asia/Bangkok).

The activity records manual weeding and soil loosening around kale plants to support plant health and continued growth.
The task was performed directly on-site using simple tools and physical labor.

This record reflects real agricultural maintenance work, captured as-is under the DGCP (Data Governance & Continuous Proof) framework.

DGCP | MMFARM-POL-2025
